system
Class AmbulanceImpl.AmbulanceInfo

java.lang.Object
  system.AmbulanceImpl.AmbulanceInfo
Enclosing class:
AmbulanceImpl
private class AmbulanceImpl.AmbulanceInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The ambulance info keep track of the information the system know about the ambulances

Author:
Antoine Cailliau

Field Detail

pos

private Coord pos
The position of the ambulance

status

private java.lang.String status
The status of ambulance, the status of an ambulance is either working, either broken

See Also:
Ambulance.WORKING, Ambulance.BROKEN

availability

private java.lang.String availability
The availability of an ambulance, the availability of an ambulance is either free, either chosen, either mobilized. The change of status is automatic with the update of the field incidentChosenFor and incidentMobilizedFor.

See Also:
Ambulance.FREE, Ambulance.MOBILIZED, Ambulance.CHOSEN

kind

private java.lang.String kind
The kind of the ambulance, either normal, either medicalized.

See Also:
Ambulance.NORMAL, Ambulance.MEDICALIZED

id

private java.lang.String id
The unique identifier of the ambulance. The name should respect the global nomenclature.

incidentChosenFor

private java.lang.String incidentChosenFor
The incident which the ambulance is chosen for.

incidentMobilizedFor

private java.lang.String incidentMobilizedFor
The incident which the ambulance is mobilized for.

Constructor Detail

AmbulanceImpl.AmbulanceInfo

public AmbulanceImpl.AmbulanceInfo(java.lang.String id,
                                   Coord position)
Create a new ambulance info using the given information. By default, the ambulance is free and working.

Parameters:
id - The unique identifier of the ambulance
position - The position of the ambulance
Method Detail

getIncidentChosenFor

public java.lang.String getIncidentChosenFor()
Return the name of the incident

Returns:
the incident chosen for the ambulance

setIncidentChosenFor

public void setIncidentChosenFor(java.lang.String incidentChosenFor)
Set the incident chosen for this ambulance and update the status of this ambulance

Parameters:
incidentChosenFor - the incident chosen for the incident.

getIncidentMobilizedFor

public java.lang.String getIncidentMobilizedFor()
Return the incident this ambulance is mobilized for.

Returns:
the incident id this ambulance is mobilized for.

setIncidentMobilizedFor

public void setIncidentMobilizedFor(java.lang.String incidentMobilizedFor)
                             throws IllegalMobilizationException
Set the incident this ambulance is mobilized for The ambulance must be chosen for this incident before otherwise, an exception IllegalMobilizationException will be thrown. If incidentMobilizedFor is null, then the ambulance will be marked as Free and will be unchosen (not chosen)

Parameters:
incidentMobilizedFor - The incident this ambulance is mobilized for.
Throws:
IllegalMobilizationException - if the ambulance was not chosen for this incident before.

the unique identifier of the ambulance

public void setId(java.lang.String id)
Set the unique identifier

id - the new unique identifier of the ambulance

getKind

public java.lang.String getKind()
Get the kind of the ambulance, either Ambulance.NORMAL either Ambulance.MEDICALIZED.

Returns:
The kind of the ambulance

setKind

public void setKind(java.lang.String kind)
             throws AmbulanceKindUnknownException
Set the kind of the ambulance, either Ambulance.NORMAL either Ambulance.MEDICALIZED.

Parameters:
kind - the kinf of the ambulance
Throws:
AmbulanceKindUnknownException - the given kind of ambulance is not known by the system.

getStatus

public java.lang.String getStatus()
Return the status of the ambulance: either Ambulance.WORKING either Ambulance.BROKEN.

Returns:
the status of the ambulance

setStatus

public void setStatus(java.lang.String status)
               throws AmbulanceStatusUnknwownException
Set the status of the ambulance: either Ambulance.WORKING either Ambulance.BROKEN. Otherwise, the function will throw an AmbulanceStatusUnknwownException

Parameters:
status - the status of the ambulance
Throws:
AmbulanceStatusUnknwownException

getAvailability

public java.lang.String getAvailability()
Return the availability of the ambulance. Either Ambulance.FREE, either Ambulance.CHOSEN, either Ambulance.MOBILIZED.

Returns:
the availability of the ambulance

setAvailability

public void setAvailability(java.lang.String availability)
                     throws AmbulanceAvailabilityUnknownException
Set the availability of the ambulance. Either Ambulance.FREE either Ambulance.CHOSEN, either Ambulance.MOBILIZED.

Parameters:
availability - the availability of the ambulance
Throws:
AmbulanceAvailabilityUnknownException - the availability of the ambulance is not known
